Sahndra Fon Dufe (amụrụ 28 Ọktoba 1989) bụ onye omere Cameroon, onye ode akwụkwọ, onye na-ese ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, na onye isi oche nke ụlọ mmepụta Indie African Pictures International
Ọ pụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri mba ụwa, gụnyere Otu abalị na Vegas na Black November
Onye na-abụ abụ Cameroon Said Barah akpọwo ya "Young Oprah " n'otu n'ime egwu ya a na-akpọ Sahndra Fon Dufe, na-enwe mmasị na nkà okike ya na mmetụta mkpali maka ụmụ agbọghọ na Africa dum

Ọrụ ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ ọ gosiputara gụnyere Yurika in Frank Rajah 's Refugees (2013) egosiputara Yvonne Nelson, Kwuni in Unconditional Love (2013) na John Dumelo, na Patience na obere ihe nkiri The Successor of Katunga(2013).

N'afọ 2012, ya na Ụlọ Ọrụ Embassy United States dị na Yaoundé, Cameroon na-arụkọ ọrụ iji hazie ọzụzụ maka ndị na-eto eto na-eme ihe nkiri site na Ụlọ Nzukọ Mba Nile nke jikọrọ aka nke a na-akpọ Know Your Craft International
Sahndra na-akwadokwa ndị na-eto eto na-eme ihe nkiri site na mmemme mmụta kwa afọ na Lourdes College, Cameroon
Ọ bụkwa olu maka Project New Bamenda, ọrụ ewepụtara iji kwado ndị na-eto eto Cameroon ndị ọchụnta ego si North West Region nke Cameroon
Fon Dufe malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ọkachamara na ihe nkiri Cameroon mgbe ọ na-agụ iwu na Mahadum Buea na Cameroon
N'amaghị nne na nna ya, ọ gbara n'ime ihe nkiri obodo abụọ dịka onye na-akwado
Ihe nkiri mbụ ọ pụtara na ya bụ ihe nkiri Gold Age Productions feature movie Standing The Rain, nke na-egosi Desmond Whyte na Proxy Buh Melvin
Enah Johnscott duziri ihe nkiri a wee kesaa ya na 2009.
Fon Dufe meriri ọtụtụ ihe nrite gụnyere nkwanye ugwu sitere na Commonwealth of Nations maka uri ya "Ezigbo mama".
